title: Seattle City Council Transportation and Utilities Committee May 19, 2021
description:
View the City of Seattle's commenting policy: seattle.gov/online-comment-policy

In-person attendance is currently prohibited per Washington State Governor's Proclamation 20-28, et. seq., until the COVID-19 State of Emergency is terminated or Proclamation 20-28 is rescinded by the Governor or State legislature. Meeting participation is limited to access by telephone conference line and online by the Seattle Channel.
Agenda: Call To Order, Approval of the Agenda; Public Comment; CB 120074: Grange Insurance Association pedestrian skybridge; CB 120061: Northwest Kidney Center pedestrian tunnel; CB 120075: BGO Plaza 600 JV LLC  vehicular and pedestrian tunnel; CB 120076: IC/RCDP Seattle Hotel, LLC pedestrian tunnel; Reappointment to Seattle School Traffic Safety Committee; CB 120052: relating to the City Light Department - Interlocal Agreement with Skagit County; Presentation: Internet for All Status Report; CB 120053: surveillance technology implementation - Forward-Looking Infrared Real-Time Video; CB 120054: surveillance technology implementation - Situational Awareness Cameras; CB 120055: surveillance technology implementation - Video Recording Systems.
